H0.text: What is the name used in North America for a man who makes his living by felling trees. Woodcutter

H1.text: What is the name used in North America for a man who makes his living by felling trees. Timberman

H2.text: What is the name used in North America for a man who makes his living by felling trees. Arborist

H3.text: What is the name used in North America for a man who makes his living by felling trees. Loggers

A4.text: An arborist's scope of work is therefore distinct from that of either a forester or a logger.

A5.text: Arborists generally focus on the health and safety of individual plants and trees, rather than managing forests or harvesting wood (silviculture or forestry).
